column4: would I destroy my system if I updated libc and all of its dependencies? I was thinking of taking these packages and installying the edgy or feisty versions on my dapper machine. I need the updated glibc for to run the latest version of audacious, which I need.
you might have to update other stuff too - but as long as you update all dependencies it should be fine
there are a lot of programs which call libc, correct? Is it possible that there will be an incompatibility issue?
yes it is very likely.  you should use the update manager
